meanings.sent1: The monitories sign on the door alerted us to the danger inside.

meanings.definition: An official notice or communication, especially one that urges or advises action
meanings.sent1: The monitories from the principal informed us about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: She received a monitories from the government urging her to get vaccinated.
meanings.sent3: The monitories on the website prompted users to update their passwords.
meanings.sent4: The monitories in the email emphasized the importance of the deadline.
meanings.sent5: The monitories on the billboard encouraged people to recycle for a cleaner environment.
